level.text: A request for a hearing shall be made within twenty (20) days after the applicant has been notified that the Board intends to deny the original application.
The Board shall send notice of the hearing to the applicant by certified mail to the last known address of the applicant no less than fifteen (15) days before the hearing.
The hearing shall be held by at least a quorum of the Board.
Evidence, including oral testimony, shall be freely admitted. The applicant shall be allowed to have counsel present.
The Board shall issue a final decision within ninety (90) days of the hearing date. The applicant shall be notified of the decision.
